text:
in test samples/tests/spec/text/verticalTextOnPath.svg the third test
on the second row does not show the 'h'.  This seems to indicate a mismatch
in the computation done for text-anchor and text on a path. Since it is
clear that the 'h' would not fit I suspect that the text-anchor calc is off
by a bit.
creator: deweese@apache.org

text: *** Bug 14677 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: deweese@apache.org

text: I believe this is fixed in CVS.
creator: deweese@apache.org
